language.entry: We are just victims in this game!
They came back from the dead!
Kill me to cover their tracks?
I'll take you all to hell if need be!
You can not fool me anymore!
Pain is an affectation. Only death is real.
The smell of blood ... Brings memories.
If i cut off your's heads, then nothing will change, because they are empty.
It's sad that I can not behead you for being stupid.
Just give me a reason, and you're dead.
I will do justice as I want!
I demand payment of my services immediately!
How many souls I've already ruined!
My hands are all covered in blood!
Do you hear noise? The market has opened!
Well, of course I can fix your boots!
DThe holiday is approaching, I need to buy cheese.
There is still a lot of work here.
Let's see if I can cut them.
Well, that's why I carry this sword with me.
Only one sure stroke is needed.
I've seen Death many times, she's my old friend.
An hour of their execution has come!
It's time for me to roll up my sleeves!
I would not want to be late for dinner!
I was elected to protect the law!
We will give them a righteous judgment!
They were sentenced, so what are we waiting for?
Do not rush. Everything goes well.
No death for you today, save that which you sow.
This ointment stinks worse than my boots!
Well, the cloak went to bandages.
These creatures are a death-sending! Formed of murder!
Something's not right. Think we been had...
If I survive, you all will be condemned!
They were ready for us... it is a trap!
Blood and bone! We are all blood and bone!
You're not even worthy of death. Such weakness!
Stop whining, you have chosen your path!
As I understand, you're needing your head only to eat...
Do not interrupt me to doing justice!
I want to get my share right now!
All of their belongings remain only to me.
I hear the drums! This is an army of field mice!
Sixteen black cats, two owls. Who else was invited to a birthday party?
I know that one... Did you follow me?!
I know them. From a execution long ago... They have come for me.
Try that on me. Go on... try it.
Let me help you choose a good melon.
Oh, no, you dropped it on my feet!
If I cannot have victory, I must have death.
I am out of your way now.
I cannot hold them back. I cannot lead.
You cannot lead as I can!
I will judge. You needn't concern yourselves.
I've done enough for you, fools.
Take my place! I must sharpen my blade!
I can't do all by myself!
No... They are too strong... too strong!
And play right into their hands? Foolish.
Best you let me handle this...
I'm not going through this barrel!
I cannot be betrayed if I am unpredictable!
None of you have the right to order me.
I will pick my own targets and position!
I will do everything according to the law!
What does it matter? We've lost.
It's better this way - what do I care.
No... No, the moment is lost.
What was that?? You hear that??
We don't like the scent of this place.
Yes. Let us sit until we are murdered.
Sleep is a pointless state where all pain is forgotten.
I don't need rest, let's push on 'til we drop!
I turn out to not see your stupid faces.
All of you will be hanged!
Now... I must rest. Please keep quiet.
I could never kill them all... Another vain fantasy.
What's that noise? You again did not feed the pigs?
Hey! I am lost in this forest!
Help me! I cannot keep the ceiling by myself!
FWhy can't I just finish it?!
How sharp is this thing? Ouch!
I knew it! You profane word of justice!
Right into a bigger trap, I bet!
I am too tired to run!
No. My end has come and passed a hundred times.
Kill or be killed, I say.
Wait! I want to play with friends!
We have not yet had tea!
Ugh.. Need to get out of here
Ungh.... It is too strong! We should flee!
... Someone told them where we'd be!
GAH! ... Whose idea was this?? HUH??
Okay, I've had enough! Try someone else!
Huh. Not bad. Not bad at all!
Wretched fool! I judge you weak!
Come on, hit me! HIIIIT MEEEE!
Sigh. Is it my turn yet?
Hmph. A child could do better.
The enemy is too strong! We must flee!
... How much are they paying you?
Quit fooling about! Or I'll kill you myself...
You would not have hit it, even if it was the size of a house.
They should give me your share...
Death is coming. The all-devourer, the all-destroyer...
You cannot trick me! You conspire with them!
Let me to catch breath first!
Hoh! Why are you scaring me?
Just leave me as I am!
Do not get out of the queue!
I don't need anything from you!
Do you think you're the smartest?
No, that's much better for me!
Ha! I may look a primitive, but I am no fool!
Back off - I like being the underdog.
After all, I'm just a murderer, even in the hands of God.
You fight well enough. So quit your moaning.
Keep your head down. That's how you survive.
You cannot die from this. I know.
We are strong together, hold fast!
We are just wasting time, we had to retreat!
And get stabbed in the back?
A little adversity will but focus the mind.
I'm afraid I can not rid him of stupidity.
I will not waste my energy on this fool.
Do I look like a servant?
I write the my last lines to the chronicle.
I do not think that this will change anything.
You'd better not annoy me. Seriously.
What did you put in there?
Only pain will satisfy my appetite.
A huge number of robbers in this area could not remain unnoticed. The royal executioner arrived.
I told you not to twitch!
And I get paid for it.
You can consider some of your misdeeds redeemed.
Your achievements here allow law to close eyes to some of your sins.
Your time has not come yet.
Not a time to die, you still have work to do.

He is a judge and a executioner, this man with steel nerves carries the will of the law to the most inaccessible places. He is familiar with death, one word of his decides who to live and who to die for.

In the arsenal of the executioner, there are many ways to make the punishment more... revealing, but its main pride is a heavy two-handed sword, sharp as a razor. The road is not the safest place, so body protection is necessary.

Ð¡ause of his work, the executioner acquired a specific sense of humor, although some would find his jokes amusing. Small problems of satellites with the law can be jammed, although this is not quite like the servant of the law. As the master of the craft the executioner knows as to deprive of a life, but also how to save it too.

He and the judge and executioner, this man with steel nerves carries the will of the law to the most inaccessible places. He is familiar with death, one word of his decides who to live and who to die for.

In the arsenal of the executioner, there are many ways to make the punishment more... revealing, but its main pride is a heavy two-handed sword, sharp as a razor. The road is not the safest place, so body protection is necessary.

Ð¡ause of his work, the executioner acquired a specific sense of humor, although some would find his jokes amusing. After all, I'm just a murderer, even in the hands of God.
You fight well enough. So quit your moaning.
Keep your head down. That's how you survive.
You cannot die from this. I know.
We are strong together, hold fast!
We are just wasting time, we had to retreat!
And get stabbed in the back?
A little adversity will but focus the mind.
I'm afraid I can not rid him of stupidity.
I will not waste my energy on this fool.
Do I look like a servant?
I write the my last lines to the chronicle.
I do not think that this will change anything.
You'd better not annoy me. Seriously.

Only pain will satisfy my appetite.

I told you not to twitch!

He and the judge and executioner, this man with steel nerves carries the will of the law to the most inaccessible places. He is familiar with death, one word of his decides who to live and who to die for.

In the arsenal of the executioner, there are many ways to make the punishment more... revealing, but its main pride is a heavy two-handed sword, sharp as a razor. The road is not the safest place, so body protection is necessary.

Ð¡ause of his work, the executioner acquired a specific sense of humor, although some would find his jokes amusing. Small problems of satellites with the law can be jammed, although this is not quite like the servant of the law. As the master of the craft the executioner knows as to deprive of a life, but also how to save it too.
We are just victims in this game!
They came back from the dead!
Kill me to cover their tracks?
I'll take you all to hell if need be!
You can not fool me anymore!
Pain is an affectation. Only death is real.
The smell of blood ... Brings memories.
If i cut off your's heads, then nothing will change, because they are empty.
It's sad that I can not behead you for being stupid.
Just give me a reason, and you're dead.
I will do justice as I want!
I demand payment of my services immediately!
How many souls I've already ruined!
My hands are all covered in blood!
Do you hear noise? The market has opened!
Well, of course I can fix your boots!
DThe holiday is approaching, I need to buy cheese.
There is still a lot of work here.
Let's see if I can cut them.
Well, that's why I carry this sword with me.
Only one sure stroke is needed.
I've seen Death many times, she's my old friend.
An hour of their execution has come!
It's time for me to roll up my sleeves!
I would not want to be late for dinner!
I was elected to protect the law!
We will give them a righteous judgment!
They were sentenced, so what are we waiting for?
Do not rush. Everything goes well.
No death for you today, save that which you sow.
